text: This is what the Commander of the armies of angels, the God whom we Israelis worship, says about Ahab the son of Kolaiah, and about Zedekiah, the son of Maaseiah, who are telling lies to you, saying that they are giving messages [MTY] from him: â€œThey will be seized and taken to [MTY] King Nebuchadnezzar, who will cause them to be executed while you are watching.
